Thanks very much for such a nice work. But still its having few problems with gauges. For example when you load FS flight plan in FMS the Sim crashes. Glass cockpit doesnt work. One main problem when u start engine manually and u press start button on ovehead panel, NH1 gauge sticks around 7 or 8. In actual it should go to 12 then u open fuel supply to start engine. There r some minor problems with it. If you solve these problems then I think it gonna be the best Fsx dash 8 ever available. Hope you will make it better. Wait for the new update. Best regards. Yago

Leobarrichello

The problem with white textures and VC is because I'm using Vista with Direct X 10 in FSX.
You'll need to uncheck this in FSX and start up FSX again. Problem solved
Okay -- not sure why TPB converted my quote marks to question marks, so I apologize to other readers if this post looks funny O.O
